text: Altererythrobacter rigui is a Gram-negative, aerobic and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Altererythrobacter which has been isolated from water from the Woopo wetland in Korea. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Altererythrobacter rigui at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingomonadales Category:Bacteria described in 2016
title: Altererythrobacter rigui
